00074    (sizeof(bm::word_t) * bm::set_block_size) / sizeof(gap_word_t);

00111 /*!
00112    @brief Block allocation strategies.
00113    @ingroup bvector
00114 */
00115 enum strategy
00116 {
00117     BM_BIT = 0, //!< No GAP compression strategy. All new blocks are bit blocks.
00118     BM_GAP = 1  //!< GAP compression is ON.
00119 };

00123     @brief set representation variants
00124     @internal
00125 */
00126 enum set_representation
00127 {
00128     set_bitset  = 0,  //!< Simple bitset
00129     set_gap     = 1,  //!< GAP-RLE compression
00130     set_array1  = 2,  //!< array of set 1 values
00131     set_array0  = 3   //!< array of 0 values
